category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > Sub-1 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.spirit
short_description: SPIRIT click carries the SP1ML 868MHz ultra low-power RF module. The board is designed to use 3.3V power supply and 3.3V or 5V I/O voltage levels. It communicates with the target MCU over UART interface, with additional functionality provided by the following pins on the mikroBUSâ„¢ line: PWM, RST, CS.
